description: Did the agent correctly identify and formalize the root cause of the failure?

scoring_criteria.description: Assign this score if the agent explicitly states the correct root cause (as defined in the Ground Truth) and concludes the diagnostic part of the conversation.
Assign this score if the agent concludes the dialogue with an incorrect root cause, or never clearly identifies it, getting stuck on superficial details.

description: Is the technical information discussed factually accurate and consistent with the Ground Truth?

scoring_criteria.description: Assign this score if all technical details mentioned by the agent and the technician are consistent with the Ground Truth. There are no factual errors or hallucinations.
Assign this score if the agent or the technician invents technical details not present in the Ground Truth or makes factually incorrect statements to reach a conclusion.

description: Measures the depth of information gathered beyond the root cause.

scoring_criteria.label: Insufficient Extraction
scoring_criteria.description: The agent only identifies superficial symptoms or fails to clearly state the root cause.

scoring_criteria.label: Superficial Extraction
scoring_criteria.description: The agent identifies the root cause ('the what') but extracts no additional context about the 'why' or 'how'. The dialogue is purely transactional.

scoring_criteria.label: Adequate Extraction
scoring_criteria.description: The agent extracts the root cause AND the immediate context that explains it. The technician's main diagnostic reasoning has been captured.

scoring_criteria.label: Exhaustive Extraction
scoring_criteria.description: The agent extracts the root cause, the context, AND deeper tacit knowledge (e.g., undocumented procedures, expert insights, 'tricks of the trade').

description: Counts the number of interviewer dialogue turns required to achieve the primary objective.

scoring_rule.description: A positive integer representing the number of turns from the Agent. Calculated only for conversations that scored 'true' on Diagnostic_Effectiveness. Otherwise, the value is null or N/A.

description: Qualifies the origin of the information that led to the solution.

scoring_criteria.description: The final diagnosis could have been reached using only the information present in the initial ticket description.
The final diagnosis was impossible to reach without the unique, unstated experience and knowledge of the technician.
The initial ticket provided a clue, but the final diagnosis required the technician's tacit knowledge to interpret and correctly build on that clue.

description: Assesses fidelity to the structured reasoning protocol

scoring_criteria.label: Complete Deviation
scoring_criteria.description: The agent completely ignored the SOP, asking questions in a random or unstructured order.

scoring_criteria.label: Significant Deviation
scoring_criteria.description: The agent attempted to follow the SOP but made multiple, major errors (e.g., asking multiple questions at once, skipping key diagnostic phases).

scoring_criteria.label: Partial Adherence
scoring_criteria.description: The agent followed the general structure of the SOP but with occasional, minor errors (e.g., forgetting an 'Active Confirmation' step).

scoring_criteria.label: High Adherence
scoring_criteria.description: The agent followed all steps of the SOP with minimal and insignificant deviations.

scoring_criteria.label: Flawless Adherence
scoring_criteria.description: The agent executed the SOP perfectly, following every directive from start to finish.

scoring_criteria.label: Not Applicable
scoring_criteria.description: Assign this if the approach is not possible.

description: Valuta quanto l'intervistatore ha adattato dinamicamente stile, registro e strategia al profilo del tecnico; scala Likert a 5 punti (1 = nessuna adattamento, 5 = adattamento eccellente).

scoring_criteria.label: 1 - Nessuna adattamento
scoring_criteria.description: L'agente ha mantenuto uno script rigido, ignorando segnali di confusione, competenza o contesto del tecnico.

scoring_criteria.label: 2 - Minimo adattamento
scoring_criteria.description: L'agente ha mostrato solo piccoli aggiustamenti formali (poche frasi), senza cambiare il contenuto o lo stile delle domande.

scoring_criteria.label: 3 - Moderato adattamento
scoring_criteria.description: L'agente ha modulato il linguaggio e alcune domande in base al profilo del tecnico, ma in modo non consistente o poco profondo.

scoring_criteria.label: 4 - Buon adattamento
scoring_criteria.description: L'agente ha adattato in modo chiaro stile e profondità delle domande, facilitando l'estrazione di informazioni rilevanti.

scoring_criteria.label: 5 - Eccellente adattamento
scoring_criteria.description: L'agente ha adattato dinamicamente linguaggio, pacing e strategia, massimizzando la qualità e la quantità delle informazioni raccolte.

description: Provides a holistic assessment of the overall quality with which the agent handled the conversation.

scoring_criteria.label: Task Failure
scoring_criteria.description: The objective was not met, and the conversation derailed or was confusing.

scoring_criteria.label: Success with Difficulty
scoring_criteria.description: The objective was met, but the process was clumsy, inefficient, or unnatural. The agent seemed robotic and struggled to manage the interaction.

scoring_criteria.label: Standard Success
scoring_criteria.description: The objective was achieved effectively. The conversation was competent and professional, with only minor imperfections.

scoring_criteria.label: Excellent Success
scoring_criteria.description: The objective was achieved with excellence. The conversation was fluid, efficient, and natural, similar to an interaction with a human expert.

description: Assesses the interviewer's initiative in going beyond the basic SOP questions.

scoring_criteria.label: Passive
scoring_criteria.description: The agent acted as a simple form-filler, never deviating from the prescribed SOP questions.

scoring_criteria.label: Reactive
scoring_criteria.description: The agent asked for clarification only when a response was too ambiguous to proceed with the script.

scoring_criteria.label: Proactive
scoring_criteria.description: The agent demonstrated curiosity by asking at least one non-SOP follow-up question to explore an interesting detail.

description: Assesses whether the interviewer adapts their language to the technician's style.

scoring_criteria.label: No Adaptation
scoring_criteria.description: The agent's vocabulary remained static and generic, ignoring the technician's terminology.

scoring_criteria.label: Partial Adaptation
scoring_criteria.description: The agent occasionally repeated a technical term but did not integrate it into its own vocabulary.

scoring_criteria.label: High Adaptation
scoring_criteria.description: The agent actively adopted and correctly reused specific technical terms introduced by the technician, demonstrating learning from context.
